translation.en: [Shrek] "Once upon a time there was a lovely princess.
translation.zh: 很久以前 有一位美丽的公主

translation.en: But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort,
translation.zh: 但是她被下了一个非常可怕的诅咒

translation.en: which could only be broken by love's first kiss.
translation.zh:
这个诅咒 只有用真爱给她的
第一个吻才能解开

translation.en: She was locked away in a castle,
translation.zh: 她被关在一个遥远的城堡里

translation.en: guarded by a terrible fire-breathing dragon.
translation.zh: 由一头可怕的喷火龙看守着

translation.en: Many brave knights had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison,
translation.zh:
许多勇敢的骑士们想去拯救她 帮她逃离这个可怕的监狱
但是却没有一个成功的

translation.en: but none prevailed.
translation.zh:
帮她逃离这个可怕的监狱
但是却没有一个成功的

translation.en: She waited in the dragon's keep, in the highest room of the tallest tower,
translation.zh:
公主只好继续留在这个
城堡最高塔的最高的房间里

translation.en: for her true love and true love's first kiss."
translation.zh: 等待她的真爱以及真爱的第一个吻

translation.en: [laughing] Like that's ever gonna happen.
translation.zh: 就好像真的会发生一样

translation.en: -[paper rustling and toilet flushes] -what a load of--
translation.zh: 真的拉了好多…

translation.en: ♪ That's the way I like it And I'll never get bored ♪
translation.zh: （小心怪物）

translation.en: ♪ Hey, now You're an all-star ♪
translation.zh: （悬赏通缉怪物）

translation.en: ♪ Get your game on, go play ♪
translation.zh: （请勿靠近）

translation.en: -Think it's in there? -All right. Let's get it!
translation.zh: 我想他在里面 好 我们去抓他

translation.en: Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that thing can do to you?
translation.zh:
等一下 你知不知道
这东西能对你做什么？

translation.en: Yeah, it'll grind your bones for its bread.
translation.zh: 对呀 他会磨你的骨头做面包吃

translation.en: [laughs] Yes, well, actually, that would be a giant.
translation.zh: 事实上 巨人才会干这种事儿

translation.en: [gasps] Now, ogres, they're much worse.
translation.zh: 怪物呢… 他们更恐怖

translation.en: They'll make a suit from your freshly peeled skin.
translation.zh:
-他们会扒了你的皮去做他的衣服
-不

translation.en: -No! -They'll shave your liver.
translation.zh: 他会把你的肝剁碎

translation.en: Squeeze the jelly from your eyes!
translation.zh: 把你的眼珠子磨成果酱

translation.en: -Actually, it's quite good on toast. -Back! Back, beast!
translation.zh:
-抹在吐司上味道还不错！
-走开 怪兽！

translation.en: Back! I warn ya!
translation.zh: 后退 我警告你啊

translation.en: [gasping] Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [whispers] This is the part where you run away.
translation.zh: 赶紧跑吧

translation.en: And stay out!
translation.zh: 滚远一点！

translation.en: "Wanted. Fairy tale creatures."
translation.zh: 通缉童话故事里的人物

translation.en: [man's voice] All right. This one's full.
translation.zh: （悬赏通缉童话故事里的人物） 好的 这辆车满了 可以走了

translation.en: -Take it away! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 好的 这辆车满了 可以走了 嘿吼嗨嗨

translation.en: -Move it along. Come on! Get up! -Next!
translation.zh: 嘿吼嗨嗨 我们就是矮人囚犯

translation.en: Give me that! Your flying days are over.
translation.zh:
给我 嘿吼嗨嗨 -你飞不起来了
-抓到女巫的赏金是二十个银币！

translation.en: That's 20 pieces of silver for the witch. Next!
translation.zh:
-你飞不起来了
-抓到女巫的赏金是二十个银币！ -下一个
-过来

translation.en: -Get up! Come on! -Twenty pieces.
translation.zh:
-这20块钱真不好赚
-快点

translation.en: [thudding] Sit down there!
translation.zh: 坐下

translation.en: -Keep quiet! -[crying]
translation.zh: 不要吵！

translation.en: This cage is too small.
translation.zh: 这个笼子太小了

translation.en: Please don't turn me in. I'll never be stubborn again.
translation.zh: 拜托了 我以后绝对不会再犯

translation.en: I can change. Please! Give me another chance!
translation.zh: 我会改的 求求你 再给我一个机会

translation.en: -Oh, shut up. Oh! -[man] Next!
translation.zh: 闭嘴 下一个

translation.en: -What have you got? -This little wooden puppet.
translation.zh:
-这是什么？
-这是一个可爱的小木偶

translation.en: I'm not a puppet. I'm a real boy.
translation.zh: 我不是小木偶 我是真的小男孩

translation.en: Five shillings for the possessed toy.
translation.zh: 这个会说谎的玩具值5块钱 带走

translation.en: -Take it away. Father, please! -Don't let them do this!
translation.zh:
这个会说谎的玩具值5块钱 带走 -爸爸 求求你 不要让他们带我走
-下一个

translation.en: -Help me! -Next. What have you got?
translation.zh:
-救我啊
-你有什么？

translation.en: -Well, I've got a talking donkey. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 我有一只会说话的驴子

translation.en: Right. Well, that's good for ten shillings, if you can prove it.
translation.zh: 是吗 如果你能证明它会说话 我给你10块钱

translation.en: Oh, go ahead, little fella.
translation.zh: 好 快说话吧 小驴子

translation.en: Well?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh, oh, he's just-- He's just a little nervous.
translation.zh: 它现在只是有点紧张

translation.en: He's really quite a chatterbox. Talk, you boneheaded dolt--
translation.zh:
它简直是个话痨 -快说话 你这只笨驴
-够了 别说了 来人啊！

translation.en: -That's it. I've heard enough. Guards! -[lady] No, no, he talks!
translation.zh:
-快说话 你这只笨驴
-够了 别说了 来人啊！ 不 它会说话 真的

translation.en: He does. I can talk. I love to talk.
translation.zh: 不 它会说话 真的 我会说话 我最会说话了

translation.en: I'm the talkingest damn thing you ever saw.
translation.zh: 我是最爱说话的驴子

translation.en: -Get her out of my sight. -No, no!
translation.zh:
-把她给我赶走
-不

translation.en: I swear! Oh! He can talk!
translation.zh: 我发誓 放开我 它真的会说话

translation.en: Hey! I can fly!
translation.zh: 嘿 我会飞！

translation.en: He can fly! He can fly!
translation.zh:
-它会飞
-会飞！

translation.en: -He can talk! -Ha, ha! That's right, fool!
translation.zh:
它会说话 答对了 笨蛋
我是个会说话又会飞的驴子

translation.en: Now I'm a flying, talking donkey.
translation.zh:
答对了 笨蛋
我是个会说话又会飞的驴子

translation.en: You might have seen a house fly, maybe even a super fly,
translation.zh:
你们或许看到过房子飞
或许看到过超人飞

translation.en: but I bet you ain't never seen a donkey fly. Ha, ha!
translation.zh:
可是我打赌
你们绝对没有看到过驴子飞

translation.en: Seize him!
translation.zh: 抓住它

translation.en: [man] After him! He's getting away!
translation.zh: 快追 别让它跑了

translation.en: [man] Get him! This way! Turn!
translation.zh:
抓住它 -这边！
-快！

translation.en: You there. Ogre!
translation.zh: 你这个怪物

translation.en: Aye?
translation.zh: （滚开）

translation.en: By the order of Lord Farquaad, I am authorized to place you both under arrest,
translation.zh:
-怎么着？
-奉法克大人的命令 我有权逮捕你们两个

translation.en: and transport you to a designated... resettlement facility.
translation.zh: 并且把你们遣送到指定的重置区

translation.en: Oh, really? You and what army?
translation.zh: 哦 真的吗？ 就凭你和你手下的人吗？

translation.en: Can I say something to you?
translation.zh: 我可以跟你说句话吗？

translation.en: Listen, you was really, really somethin' back there. Incredible!
translation.zh: 说真的 你真是非常了不起！ 太厉害了

translation.en: Are you talkin' to-- me? Whoa!
translation.zh: 你在跟我… 说话？

translation.en: Yes, I was talkin' to you. Can I tell you that you was great back there?
translation.zh:
没错 我是在跟你讲话
我要告诉你 你真的是超厉害的

translation.en: Those guards!
translation.zh: 那些卫兵还以为自己多了不起

translation.en: They thought they was all of that. Then you showed up, and bam!
translation.zh: 那些卫兵还以为自己多了不起 你一出现 他们就落荒而逃了

translation.en: They was trippin' over themselves like babes in the woods.
translation.zh: 你一出现 他们就落荒而逃了

translation.en: That really made me feel good to see that.
translation.zh: 我看了感觉很爽

translation.en: -Oh, that's great. Really. -Man, it's good to be free.
translation.zh:
-那真的是太好了
-自由的感觉真好

translation.en: Now, why don't you go celebrate your freedom with your own friends? Hmm?
translation.zh:
那你为什么不去跟你自己的朋友
庆祝你重获自由呢？

translation.en: But, uh, I don't have any friends.
translation.zh: 可是我一个朋友也没有

translation.en: And I'm not goin' out there by myself.
translation.zh: 而且 我不要一个人离开这里

translation.en: Hey, wait a minute! I got a great idea! I'll stick with you.
translation.zh:
嘿 等一下 我想到一个好点子
我要跟你一起走

translation.en: You're a mean, green, fightin' machine.
translation.zh: 你是一个足够威武的好汉

translation.en: Together we'll scare the spit out of anybody that crosses us.
translation.zh: 我们两个联手 绝对所向无敌

translation.en: Oh, wow! That was really scary.
translation.zh: 真的很吓人

translation.en: [Donkey] If you don't mind me sayin', if that don't work, your breath certainly will get the job done,
translation.zh:
别介意我这么说
你的口气肯定能把别人熏死

translation.en: 'cause you definitely need some Tic Tacs or something, 'cause your breath stinks!
translation.zh:
你应该去买漱口水
因为你的嘴角巴臭死了

translation.en: You almost burned the hair outta my nose, just like the time-- [mumbling]
translation.zh:
你熏得我鼻毛都掉光了
让我想起有一次…

translation.en: Then I ate some rotten berries.
translation.zh: 然后我吃到了一堆烂掉的莓子后

translation.en: I had strong gases eking out of my butt that day.
translation.zh: 我放了一天的屁

translation.en: Why are you following me?
translation.zh: 为什么你要跟着我？

translation.en: I'll tell you why.
translation.zh: 我告诉你为什么

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm all alone ♪
translation.zh: 因为我寂寞

translation.en: ♪ There's no one here beside me ♪
translation.zh: 我一直孤家寡人

translation.en: ♪ My problems have all gone ♪
translation.zh: 我的烦恼都跑走

translation.en: ♪ There's no one to deride me ♪
translation.zh: 没有人会嘲笑我

translation.en: ♪ But you gotta have friends ♪
translation.zh: 但是你得有朋友…

translation.en: Stop singing!
translation.zh: 不要再唱了！

translation.en: Well, It's no wonder you don't have any friends.
translation.zh: 难怪你一个朋友都没有

translation.en: Wow. Only a true friend would be that truly honest.
translation.zh: 只有真正的朋友才会对你说真话

translation.en: Listen, little donkey. Take a look at me. What am I?
translation.zh:
听着 小驴子
好好地看看我 我是何物？

translation.en: -Really tall? -No! I'm an ogre.
translation.zh:
-很高？
-不是！ 我是个怪物

translation.en: You know. "Grab your torch and pitchforks."
translation.zh: 就是每个人看到都会害怕的！

translation.en: Doesn't that bother you?
translation.zh: 你不觉得可怕吗？

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -Nope.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Really? -Really, really.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-真的

translation.en: -Oh. -Man, I like you. What's your name?
translation.zh: 我欣赏你 你叫什么名？

translation.en: Uh, Shrek.
translation.zh: 史瑞克

translation.en: Shrek? Well, you know what I like about you, Shrek?
translation.zh: 史瑞克？你知道我为什么欣赏你吗？

translation.en: You got that kind of I-don't-care-what- nobody-thinks-of-me thing.
translation.zh: 你有一种不管别人怎么想的心态

translation.en: I like that. I respect that, Shrek. You all right.
translation.zh: 我就敬仰你这一点 你人不错

translation.en: Whoo! Look at that. Who'd want to live in a place like that?
translation.zh: 看看这个 谁会住在这种鬼地方？

translation.en: That would be my home.
translation.zh: 那个鬼地方是我的家

translation.en: Oh! And it is lovely! Just beautiful.
translation.zh: 真是小巧可爱 太美了！

translation.en: You know, you are quite a decorator. It's amazing what you've done with such a modest budget.
translation.zh:
你真是一个有眼光的艺术家
你看就是花小钱的大杰作！

translation.en: I like that boulder. That is a nice boulder.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这些石头 非常不错

translation.en: I guess you don't entertain much, do you?
translation.zh: 我猜想你应该很少有休闲娱乐吧？

translation.en: I like my privacy.
translation.zh: 我喜欢保有隐私

translation.en: You know, I do too. That's another thing we have in common.
translation.zh:
你知道吗 我也是一样
我们又有一个共同点

translation.en: Like, I hate it when you got somebody in your face. You're trying to give them a hint, and they won't leave.
translation.zh:
我很讨厌一直被人跟着
你怎么赶都赶不走他们

translation.en: There's that awkward silence, you know.
translation.zh: 尴尴尬尬的 也不讲个话

translation.en: -Can I stay with you? -Uh, what?
translation.zh: 我可以留下来吗？ 什么？

translation.en: Can I stay with you, please?
translation.zh: 我可以留下来吗？拜托

translation.en: -Of course! -Really?
translation.zh: 当然了！

translation.en: -No. -Please! I don't wanna go back there!
translation.zh:
-真的？
-没戏！ 拜托了！我真的不想再回去了！
你不知道被人家当成怪胎的感觉

translation.en: You don't know what it's like to be considered a freak. Well, maybe you do.
translation.zh:
拜托了！我真的不想再回去了！
你不知道被人家当成怪胎的感觉 也许你知道
这就是为什么我们要在一起

translation.en: But that's why we gotta stick together. You gotta let me stay!
translation.zh:
也许你知道
这就是为什么我们要在一起 你一定要留我下来！拜托了！

translation.en: Please! Please! Okay! Okay!
translation.zh: 你一定要留我下来！拜托了！ 好啦

translation.en: -But one night only. -Ah! Thank you!
translation.zh:
-可是你只能留一个晚上！
-谢谢你！

translation.en: -What are you-- No! No! -This is gonna be fun!
translation.zh:
-你在干吗…
-这个一定很有意思！

translation.en: We can stay up late, swappin' manly stories,
translation.zh:
我们可以一起秉烛夜谈
聊聊天 叙叙往事

translation.en: and in the mornin' I'm makin' waffles.
translation.zh: 等到了早上 我做早点给你吃

translation.en: -Oh! -Where do, uh, I sleep?
translation.zh: 我在哪里睡？

translation.en: Outside!
translation.zh: 外面！

translation.en: Oh, well, I guess that's cool.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: I mean, I don't know you, and you don't know me, so I guess outside is best, you know.
translation.zh:
我们也不太熟
可能睡外面是最好的选择

translation.en: [sniffles] Here I go.
translation.zh: 我出去了

translation.en: Good night. [sighs]
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [Donkey] I mean, I do like the outdoors. I'm a donkey. I was born outside.
translation.zh:
其实我蛮喜欢住外面的 我是头驴子
我就是外面生的

translation.en: I'll just be sitting by myself outside, I guess, you know.
translation.zh: 那我就自己在外面待着了 也没有人

translation.en: By myself, outside.
translation.zh: 也没有人

translation.en: ♪ I'm all alone There's no one here beside me ♪
translation.zh: 我好寂寞 孤家寡人的

translation.en: [sighs] I thought I told you to stay outside.
translation.zh: 我不是叫你乖乖地呆在外面吗？

translation.en: -[Donkey] i am outside. -[clattering]
translation.zh: 我是在外面啊

translation.en: Well, gents, it's a far cry from the farm, but what choice do we have?
translation.zh: 弟兄们 这里比我们住的农场差多了 可我们也别无选择了

translation.en: It's not home, but it'll do just fine.
translation.zh: 虽然不是家 但勉强可以住了

translation.en: What a lovely bed.
translation.zh:
-这个床真舒服
-抓到了

translation.en: -Got ya. [sniffs] -I found some cheese.
translation.zh: 我好像闻到了奶酪的味道

translation.en: -Ow! [grunts] -Blah! Awful stuff.
translation.zh: 好难吃！

translation.en: -Is that you, Gorder? -How did you know?
translation.zh:
-是你吗 高多？
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: Enough! What are you doing in my house?
translation.zh: 够了！你们来我家做什么？

translation.en: [grunts] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -[snickers] -Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不行！

translation.en: Dead broad off the table.
translation.zh: 不要放个死人在我桌上

translation.en: Where are we supposed to put her? The bed's taken.
translation.zh: 我们该放在哪里呢？床已经睡满了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 有意见吗？

translation.en: I live in a swamp. I put up signs. I'm a terrifying ogre!
translation.zh: 这沼泽是我的家 我特别放了告示牌 我是个可怕的怪物！

translation.en: What do I have to do to get a little privacy?
translation.zh:
我到底要怎么做
才能过着保有隐私的生活？

translation.en: -Aah! -Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不会吧

translation.en: -No! No! -[cackling]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -Quit it. -Don't push.
translation.zh: 嘿 别推

translation.en: What are you doing in my swamp? [echoing] Swamp! Swamp! Swamp!
translation.zh: 你们干吗都跑到我的沼泽来？

translation.en: -[gasping] -Oh, dear!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: All right, get out of here. All of you, move it!
translation.zh: 好了 你们全部的人统统给我离开！

translation.en: Come on! Let's go! Hapaya! Hapaya! Hey!
translation.zh:
快点走了 走了！ -嘿
-快走

translation.en: -Quickly. Come on! -No, no!
translation.zh:
-嘿
-快走 不要往那边走

translation.en: No, no. Not there. Not there.
translation.zh: 不要往那边走 别去那边

translation.en: Hey, don't look at me. I didn't invite them.
translation.zh: 干吗看我 又不是我请来的

translation.en: Oh, gosh, no one invited us.
translation.zh:
-天哪 我们不是被请来的
-什么？

translation.en: -What? -We were forced to come here.
translation.zh:
-天哪 我们不是被请来的
-什么？ 我们是被赶来的

translation.en: -By who? -Lord Farquaad.
translation.zh:
-被谁啊？
-法克大人

translation.en: He huffed und he puffed und he... signed an eviction notice.
translation.zh: 他坏透了 而且他还开出一张驱逐令

translation.en: [sighs] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Who knows where this Farquaad guy is?
translation.zh:
好吧 有谁知道
这个叫法克的人住在哪里？

translation.en: -[murmuring] Oh, I do. -I know where he is.
translation.zh: 我知道 我知道他住哪

translation.en: Does anyone else know where to find him?
translation.zh: 还有没有别人知道他住在哪里的？

translation.en: -Anyone at all? -Me! Me!
translation.zh:
-谁都行
-我！

translation.en: -Anyone? -Oh! Oh, pick me!
translation.zh:
-谁？
-选我！

translation.en: Oh, I know! I know! Me, me!
translation.zh: 我知道！我！

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, fine.
translation.zh: 好吧 很好

translation.en: Attention, all fairy tale things.
translation.zh:
注意 听我说
你们这些童话故事里的东西

translation.en: Do not get comfortable. Your welcome is officially worn out.
translation.zh: 别把这里当自己的家 我从来没有欢迎过你们来这里

translation.en: In fact, I'm gonna see this guy Farquaad right now
translation.zh:
事实上 我现在就去找
这个叫法克的人

translation.en: and get you all off my land and back where you came from!
translation.zh:
好让你们离开我这里
回到属于你们自己的地方！

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[cheering continues]
translation.zh: 我们有救了！

translation.en: Oh! You!
translation.zh: 走开！ 你

translation.en: You're comin' with me.
translation.zh: 你跟我一起去

translation.en: All right, that's what I like to hear, man.
translation.zh: 太好了 我正在等你说这句话

translation.en: Shrek and Donkey, two stalwart friends, off on a whirlwind big-city adventure.
translation.zh:
史瑞克跟驴子
两个真正勇敢的好朋友 要去大城市冒险

translation.en: I love it!
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: ♪ On the road again ♪
translation.zh: 又上路了

translation.en: Sing it with me Shrek.
translation.zh: 跟我一起唱 史瑞克

translation.en: ♪ I can't wait to get On the road again ♪
translation.zh: 我等不及再一次上路了

translation.en: What did I say about singing?
translation.zh: 我不是跟你说过别再唱了？

translation.en: -Can I whistle? -No.
translation.zh:
-那可以吹口哨吗？
-不行

translation.en: -Can I hum it? -All right, hum it.
translation.zh:
-哼歌呢？
-好吧 哼着呢

translation.en: That's enough. He's ready to talk.
translation.zh:
-不！
-够了 他愿意讲了

translation.en: Run, run, run, as fast as you can.
translation.zh: 跑 随便跑吧

translation.en: You can't catch me. I'm the gingerbread man!
translation.zh: 你抓不到我 因为我是个姜饼人！

translation.en: -You're a monster. -I'm not the monster here. You are.
translation.zh: 你是个怪兽！ 我不是怪兽 你才是

translation.en: You and the rest of that fairy tale trash, poisoning my perfect world.
translation.zh:
就是你和其他讨厌的垃圾童话人物
毁了我完美的王国

translation.en: Now, tell me! Where are the others? -Eat me! -[grunts]
translation.zh:
-告诉我 其他人在哪里？
-有种吃了我！

translation.en: I've tried to be fair to you creatures.
translation.zh:
我一直不想逼迫这些怪物
可是 我的耐心已经耗尽

translation.en: Now my patience has reached its end! Tell me or I'll--
translation.zh:
我一直不想逼迫这些怪物
可是 我的耐心已经耗尽 -快点说 否则我…
-不要拿走我的纽扣

translation.en: No, no, not the buttons. Not my gumdrop buttons.
translation.zh:
-快点说 否则我…
-不要拿走我的纽扣 别动我的糖衣纽扣！

translation.en: All right then. Who's hiding them?
translation.zh: 快说 谁把他们藏起来了？

translation.en: Okay, I'll tell you. Do you know the muffin man?
translation.zh: 好吧 我说 你听说过松饼人吗？

translation.en: -The muffin man? -The muffin man.
translation.zh:
-松饼人？
-松饼人

translation.en: Yes, I know the muffin man, who lives on Drury Lane?
translation.zh: 我听说过松饼人 那住在特鲁里街上的是谁？

translation.en: Well, she's married to the muffin man.
translation.zh: 她嫁给了松饼人

translation.en: -The muffin man? -The muffin man!
translation.zh:
-松饼人？
-松饼人

translation.en: -She's married to the muffin man. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 她嫁给了松饼人

translation.en: My lord! We found it.
translation.zh: 大人！我们找到了！

translation.en: Then what are you waiting for? Bring it in.
translation.zh: 那你们还在等什么？快拿进来

translation.en: -Magic mirror-- -Don't tell him anything!
translation.zh: 魔镜 什么都不要告诉他！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -[gingerbread man whimpers] -Evening.
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: Mirror, mirror, on the wall. Is this not the most perfect kingdom of them all?
translation.zh:
魔镜 魔镜告诉我
最完美的王国是不是属于我？

translation.en: Well, technically you're not a king.
translation.zh: 严格来说 你不是国王

translation.en: Uh, Thelonius.
translation.zh: 塞隆尼斯

translation.en: -You were saying? -What I mean is, you're not a king yet.
translation.zh:
-你刚说什么？
-我的意思是 你还没当上国王

translation.en: But you can become one. All you have to do is marry a princess.
translation.zh: 但你可以当上国王啊 你只要跟一个公主结婚就好了

translation.en: -Go on. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 继续讲

translation.en: So, just sit back and relax, my lord,
translation.zh: 大人 现在请你放轻松慢慢欣赏

translation.en: because it's time for you to meet today's eligible bachelorettes.
translation.zh:
因为你就将要看到
当今最美丽的单身女子们

translation.en: And here they are!
translation.zh: 她们来了

translation.en: [mirror] Bachelorette number one is a mentally abused shut-in
translation.zh:
单身女郞1号
她住在一个很远很远的王国

translation.en: from a kingdom far, far away.
translation.zh: 身心饱受虐待

translation.en: She likes sushi and hot tubbing anytime.
translation.zh: 她最喜欢吃寿司和泡澡

translation.en: Her hobbies include cooking and cleaning for her two evil sisters.
translation.zh:
她最喜欢的事就是烹饪
还要帮她两个邪恶的妹妹打扫

translation.en: -Please welcome Cinderella. -[applauds]
translation.zh: 让我们欢迎灰姑娘！

translation.en: Bachelorette number two is a cape-wearing girl from the land of fancy.
translation.zh:
单身女郞2号来自奇幻王国
总是穿着斗篷

translation.en: Although she lives with seven other men, she's not easy.
translation.zh:
虽然她跟7个男人同居
但她可不是随便的人

translation.en: Just kiss her dead, frozen lips and find out what a live wire she is.
translation.zh:
你必须亲吻她极度冰冷的嘴唇
才能重唤她的热情

translation.en: Come on. Give it up for Snow White!
translation.zh: 来欢迎白雪公主！

translation.en: And last, but certainly not least,
translation.zh: 压轴的是

translation.en: bachelorette number three is a fiery redhead...
translation.zh: 单身女郎3号 一个被可怕的

translation.en: from a dragon-guarded castle surrounded by hot boiling lava!
translation.zh:
喷火龙守护的城堡
城堡周围都是滚烫的岩浆

translation.en: But don't let that cool you off. She's a loaded pistol who likes pina coladas
translation.zh: 不要因此而退缩 她可是风情万种

translation.en: and getting caught in the rain. Yours for the rescuing, Princess Fiona!
translation.zh:
热情似火
她就是等待救援的菲欧娜公主

translation.en: So will it be bachelorette number one,
translation.zh: 现在你的选择是单身女郎1号

translation.en: bachelorette number two or bachelorette number three?
translation.zh: 单身女郎2号 还是单身女郎3号？

translation.en: -Two! Two! -Three! Three!
-Two! Two! -Three!
Three? One? [shudders] Three?
Three! Pick number three, my lord!
translation.zh: 3号 大人选3号！

translation.en: Okay, okay, uh, number three!
translation.zh: 好了 3号！

translation.en: Lord Farquaad, you've chosen Princess Fiona.
translation.zh: 法克大人 你选择的是菲欧娜公主

translation.en: ♪ And getting caught in the rain ♪ Princess Fiona.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜公主

translation.en: ♪ If you're not into yoga ♪ She's perfect.
translation.zh:
她很完美 我现在要做的
就是找一个人帮我…

translation.en: All I have to do is just find someone who can go--
translation.zh:
她很完美 我现在要做的
就是找一个人帮我… 我刚才应该提到等太阳下山后…

translation.en: But I probably should mention the little thing that happens at night.
translation.zh: 我刚才应该提到等太阳下山后…

translation.en: -I'll do it. -Yes, but after sunset--
translation.zh:
-我会去的
-但是在日落后…

translation.en: Silence! I will make this Princess Fiona my queen,
translation.zh: 闭嘴！ 我要让菲欧娜公主当我的皇后…

translation.en: and DuLoc will finally have the perfect king!
translation.zh:
我们杜罗克总算
要有一个完美的国王了

translation.en: Captain, assemble your finest men.
translation.zh: 队长 快去召集你最强的手下

translation.en: We're going to have a tournament.
translation.zh: 我们要举办一场竞技赛

translation.en: But that's it. That's it right there. That's DuLoc.
translation.zh: 到了 这就是杜罗克

translation.en: I told ya I'd find it.
translation.zh: 我跟你说我能找到吧

translation.en: So, that must be Lord Farquaad's castle.
translation.zh:
这么说 这个地方
就是法克大人的城堡了

translation.en: [Donkey] Uh-huh. That's the place.
translation.zh: 就是这里

translation.en: Do you think maybe he's compensating for something?
translation.zh: 他这是在择长补短吗？

translation.en: Hey, wait. Wait up, Shrek.
translation.zh: 等我一下 史瑞克

translation.en: -Hey, you! -[screams]
translation.zh: 嘿 你 （在这里还需等待45分钟）

translation.en: Wait a second. Look, I'm not gonna eat ya.
translation.zh: 等一下 干吗 我又不会吃了你

translation.en: -I just-- I just-- -[whimpering]
translation.zh: 我只是…我是要…

translation.en: It's quiet.
translation.zh: 好安静

translation.en: Too quiet.
translation.zh: 太安静了

translation.en: Where is everybody? Hey, look at this!
translation.zh: 人都跑哪去了？ 你看这个！

translation.en: ♪ Welcome to DuLoc Such a perfect town ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎来杜罗克这个美丽的地方

translation.en: ♪ Here we have some rules Let us lay them down ♪
translation.zh: 有一些规则要和你分享 （规则）

translation.en: ♪ Don't make waves Stay in line and we'll get along fine ♪
translation.zh: 要安静守秩序 才会有好环境

translation.en: ♪ DuLoc is a perfect place ♪
translation.zh: 杜罗克是个好地方

translation.en: ♪ Please keep off of the grass Shine your shoes Wipe your... face ♪
translation.zh: 要爱护花草和树木 擦亮鞋 擦净脸

translation.en: ♪ DuLoc is DuLoc is ♪
translation.zh: 杜罗克是

translation.en: ♪ DuLoc is a perfect ♪ ♪ Place ♪
translation.zh: 杜罗克是个好地方

translation.en: Wow! Let's do that again!
translation.zh: 我们再玩一遍！

translation.en: No. No. No, no, no! No.
translation.zh: 不要 不要！

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[Farquaad] Brave knights.
translation.zh: 勇敢的武士们

translation.en: You are the best and brightest in all the land.
translation.zh: 你们是世界上最优秀、最聪明的人

translation.en: Today one of you shall prove himself--
translation.zh: 今天 你们中的一个将证明…

translation.en: All right. You're going the right way for a smacked bottom.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 再这样乱哼 我该打人了

translation.en: -Sorry about that. -[cheering]
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: That champion shall have the honour-- No, no, the privilege,
translation.zh: 冠军将拥有这个荣誉 不…是这个特权

translation.en: to go forth and rescue the lovely Princess Fiona,
translation.zh:
可以代表我去拯救出 最可爱的公主菲欧娜
并且打倒可怕的喷火龙

translation.en: from the fiery keep of the dragon.
translation.zh:
最可爱的公主菲欧娜
并且打倒可怕的喷火龙

translation.en: If for any reason the winner is unsuccessful,
translation.zh:
如果出了什么意外
冠军没有达成任务的话

translation.en: the first runner-up will take his place,
translation.zh: 第二名的人将继续完成这个任务

translation.en: and so on and so forth.
translation.zh: 以此类推

translation.en: Some of you may die, but it's a sacrifice I am willing to make.
translation.zh:
或许会有人因而死掉
但这小小的牺牲是我愿意付出的

translation.en: Let the tournament begin!
translation.zh: 竞技赛现在开始！

translation.en: [gasps] Oh!
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: -What is that? -[gasping]
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: -It's hideous! -Ah, that's not very nice.
translation.zh: 真丑！ 真没礼貌

translation.en: -It's just a donkey. -Huh?
translation.zh: 他不过就是一头驴子

translation.en: Indeed. Knights, new plan!
translation.zh: 没错 武士们 计划改变！

translation.en: The one who kills the ogre will be named champion! Have at him!
translation.zh:
谁能够杀了这个怪物
谁就是最强的人！ 大家上！

translation.en: [man] Get him!
translation.zh:
-抓住他！
-嘿 别这样

translation.en: Oh, hey! Now come on! Hang on now.
translation.zh:
-抓住他！
-嘿 别这样 -抓住他！
-等一下

translation.en: [woman] Go ahead! Get him!
translation.zh: 抓住他

translation.en: Can't we just settle this over a pint?
translation.zh: 难道大家就不能坐下来喝一杯吗？

translation.en: [man] Kill the beast!
translation.zh:
-杀了这个怪物！
-打死他

translation.en: No? All right then.
translation.zh: 不要？那好吧

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: ♪ I don't give a damn About my reputation ♪
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: ♪ Me, me, me ♪
translation.zh: 嘿 史瑞克

translation.en: Hey, Shrek, tag me! Tag me!
translation.zh: 让我上！

translation.en: The chair! Give him the chair!
translation.zh: 用椅子 用椅子打他！

translation.en: ♪ Oh, no, no, no, no, no Not me ♪
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Thank you! Thank you very much!
translation.zh: 谢谢！ 非常感谢大家！我会呆到礼拜四

translation.en: I'm here till Thursday. Try the veal! Ha, ha!
translation.zh: 非常感谢大家！我会呆到礼拜四 记得点小牛肉！

translation.en: Shall I give the order, sir?
translation.zh: 要下令吗 大人？

translation.en: No, I have a better idea.
translation.zh: 不用 我有更好的计划

translation.en: People of DuLoc, I give you our champion!
translation.zh: 杜罗克的臣民们！ 我现在宣布今天的优胜者！

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Farquaad] Congratulations, ogre.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 怪物

translation.en: You've won the honour of embarking on a great and noble quest.
translation.zh:
你获得了胜利
赢得了执行神圣任务的特权

translation.en: Quest? I'm already on a quest, a quest to get my swamp back.
translation.zh: 任务？我正在执行我的任务 我要把我的沼泽要回来

translation.en: -Your swamp? -Yeah, my swamp!
translation.zh: 你的沼泽？ 是啊 我的沼泽！

translation.en: Where you dumped those fairy tale creatures!
translation.zh:
你把童话故事里的人物
全都丢到那去了！

translation.en: [crowd murmuring] Indeed.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: All right, ogre, I'll make you a deal.
translation.zh: 好吧 怪物 我们来谈个条件

translation.en: Go on this quest for me, and I'll give you your swamp back.
translation.zh:
你去帮我完成神圣的任务
我就把你的沼泽还给你

translation.en: Exactly the way it was?
translation.zh: 恢复到以前的那个样子吗？

translation.en: Down to the last slime-covered toadstool.
translation.zh: 连一粒沙 一粒石头都不会少你的

translation.en: -And the squatters? -As good as gone.
translation.zh: 那些不速之客呢？ 全都会被赶走

translation.en: What kind of quest?
translation.zh: 是什么样的任务？

translation.en: [Donkey] Let me get this straight. You're gonna go fight a dragon
translation.zh: 让我弄弄清楚 你要从一条龙的手中

translation.en: and rescue a princess just so Farquaad will give you back a swamp,
translation.zh:
救出那个公主
这样法克才会把你的沼泽还给你

translation.en: which you only don't have because he filled it full of freaks in the first place.
translation.zh:
可是你失去沼泽的根本原因
是他把那些怪胎赶去了你那里

translation.en: Is that about right?
translation.zh:
-对吗？
-你知道吗？

translation.en: Maybe there's a good reason donkeys shouldn't talk.
translation.zh: 也许驴子不该说话 是有原因的

translation.en: I don't get it. Why don't you just pull some of that ogre stuff on him?
translation.zh:
我真搞不懂 史瑞克
为什么你不吓唬吓唬他算了

translation.en: Throttle him, lay siege to his fortress,
translation.zh:
比如说 围攻他的堡垒
把他的骨头磨碎做面包

translation.en: grind his bones to make your bread, the whole ogre trip.
translation.zh:
比如说 围攻他的堡垒
把他的骨头磨碎做面包 就是你那一套

translation.en: Oh, I know what.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Maybe I could have decapitated an entire village and put their heads on a pike,
translation.zh:
也许我还可以把整个村子里的人
都抓起来 把他们的手都夹起来

translation.en: gotten a knife, cut open their spleen and drink their fluids.
translation.zh:
拿把刀子在他们身上戳个洞
再喝他们的流出来的血

translation.en: Does that sound good to you?
translation.zh: 这样你就满意了吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, not really, no.
translation.zh: 我不是这个意思

translation.en: For your information, there's a lot more to ogres than people think.
translation.zh:
其实我告诉你
怪物并不像一般人所想的那个样子

translation.en: Example? Example?
translation.zh:
-举个例子？
-举个例子？

translation.en: -Okay, um, ogres are like onions. -[sniffs] They stink?
translation.zh:
好… 怪物就像洋葱一样 -洋葱很臭？
-对

translation.en: -Yes-- No! -They make you cry?
translation.zh:
-不！
-让你流眼泪

translation.en: -No. -Oh,You leave them out in the sun,
translation.zh:
-不是
-如果让它们去晒太阳

translation.en: they get all brown, start sproutin' little white hairs.
translation.zh: 就会被晒黑 而且会开始长出白头发

translation.en: No! Layers!
translation.zh: 不是 是层次！

translation.en: Onions have layers.
translation.zh: 洋葱是有层次的

translation.en: Ogres have layers! Onions have layers.
translation.zh: 怪物也有层次 跟洋葱一样

translation.en: You get it? We both have layers. [sighs]
translation.zh: 你懂了吗？我们都有层次内涵

translation.en: Oh, you both have layers. Oh.
translation.zh: 你们都是一层一层的

translation.en: [sniffs] You know, not everybody likes onions.
translation.zh: 并不是每个人都爱吃洋葱啊

translation.en: Cake! Everybody loves cakes! Cakes have layers.
translation.zh:
蛋糕！大家都爱吃蛋糕！ -蛋糕也是一层一层的
-我才不在乎大家喜欢什么

translation.en: I don't care... what everyone likes.
translation.zh:
-蛋糕也是一层一层的
-我才不在乎大家喜欢什么

translation.en: Ogres are not like cakes.
translation.zh: 怪物一点都不像蛋糕

translation.en: You know what else everybody likes? Parfaits.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 大家还喜欢吃芭菲？

translation.en: Have you ever met a person, you say, "Let's get some parfait,"
translation.zh:
你遇到过什么人 你跟他说
“嘿 来吃个芭菲”

translation.en: they say, "No, I don't like no parfait"?
translation.zh:
他会说“我讨厌芭菲”的吗？
芭菲最好吃了

translation.en: -Parfaits are delicious. -No!
translation.zh:
他会说“我讨厌芭菲”的吗？
芭菲最好吃了 别说了 你这个毛茸茸的话唠

translation.en: You dense, irritating, miniature beast of burden!
translation.zh: 别说了 你这个毛茸茸的话唠

translation.en: Ogres are like onions! End of story.
translation.zh: 怪物就跟洋葱一样！ 故事结束 再见

translation.en: Bye-bye. See ya later.
translation.zh: 故事结束 再见 回头见

translation.en: Parfaits may be the most delicious thing on the whole damn planet.
translation.zh:
芭菲真的是这个世界上
最好吃的东西了

translation.en: [Shrek] You know, I think I preferred your humming.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我宁愿听你哼歌

translation.en: [Donkey] Do you have a tissue or something? I'm making a mess.
translation.zh: 你有没有纸巾？我一嘴口水

translation.en: Just the word parfait make me start slobbering.
translation.zh: 一提到芭菲 我就口水滴答

translation.en: Ooh! Shrek! Did you do that? You gotta warn somebody before you just crack one off.
translation.zh:
史瑞克！是你吗？
你放屁之前先通知一声

translation.en: My mouth was open and everything.
translation.zh: 我刚才嘴巴是张开的

translation.en: Believe me, Donkey, if it was me, you'd be dead.
translation.zh:
相信我 驴子
如果是我放的 你早就没命了

translation.en: [sniffs] It's brimstone.
translation.zh: 是硫磺的味道 我们应该快到了

translation.en: -We must be getting close. -Yeah, right, brimstone.
translation.zh: 是硫磺的味道 我们应该快到了 是啊 硫磺

translation.en: Don't be talking about it's the brimstone. I know what I smell. It wasn't no brimstone.
translation.zh: 别说什么硫磺了 我一闻就知道是屁

translation.en: It didn't come off no stone neither.
translation.zh: 石头才不会放屁

translation.en: Sure, it's big enough, but look at the location.
translation.zh:
真是够大的
可是为什么要盖在这种地方呢

translation.en: Uh, Shrek? Uh, remember when you said ogres have layers?
translation.zh: 史瑞克 你还记得你说的 怪物都是有层次的吗？

translation.en: Oh, aye.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Well, I have a bit of a confession to make.
translation.zh: 我必须跟你坦白一件事情

translation.en: Donkeys don't have layers. We wear our fear right out there on our sleeves.
translation.zh: 驴子没有 如果我们害怕 就会把头缩起来

translation.en: -Wait a second. Donkeys don't have sleeves -You know what I mean.
translation.zh: 等一下 驴子哪会缩头 你知道我的意思

translation.en: You can't tell me you're afraid of heights.
translation.zh: 你该不是要说你有惧高症吧

translation.en: No, I'm just a little uncomfortable about being on a rickety bridge over a boiling lake of lava!
translation.zh:
不是 只是要我从沸腾的岩浆上过桥
让我觉得很紧张

translation.en: Come on, Donkey. I'm right here beside ya, okay?
translation.zh:
不要这样 驴子
我在边上保护你 好吗？

translation.en: For emotional support,
translation.zh: 在精神上支持你

translation.en: we'll just tackle this thing together one little baby step at a time.
translation.zh:
我们一步一步小心地往前走
很快就会走到对面的

translation.en: -Really? -Really, really.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-真的 真的

translation.en: -Okay, that makes me feel so much better. -Just keep moving.
translation.zh: 好吧 我感觉好多了 一直往前走 千万不要往下看

translation.en: And don't look down.
translation.zh: 一直往前走 千万不要往下看

translation.en: Don't look down. Okay, don't look down.
translation.zh: 不要往下看 一直往前走 不要往下看 一直往前走

translation.en: Don't look down. Keep on moving. Don't look down.
translation.zh: 不要往下看 不要往下看 一直往前走

translation.en: [gasps] Shrek! I'm lookin' down!
translation.zh: 史瑞克！我往下看了！

translation.en: Oh, God, I can't do this! Just let me off, please!
translation.zh:
-让我回去！求求你！
-可是你都已经走了一半了！

translation.en: -But you're already halfway. -But I know that half is safe!
translation.zh:
-让我回去！求求你！
-可是你都已经走了一半了！ 至少我知道那一半是安全的！

translation.en: Okay, fine. I don't have time for this. You go back.
translation.zh: 好了 我没这个时间 你回去吧

translation.en: -Shrek, no! Wait! -Just, Donkey--
translation.zh:
-史瑞克！等一下！
-驴子 我们来跳个舞吧 好不好！

translation.en: -Let's have a dance then, shall we? -Don't do that!
translation.zh: 我们来跳个舞吧 好不好！ 不要这样！

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Do what?
translation.zh: 对不起 不要怎样？

translation.en: -Oh, this? -Yes, that!
translation.zh:
这样吗？ -没错 这样
-是吗？

translation.en: Yes? Yes, do it. Okay.
translation.zh:
-没错 这样
-是吗？ 那好 那就这样 好吧

translation.en: [screams] No, Shrek!
translation.zh: 来了 不 史瑞克

translation.en: -No! Stop it! You said do it! -I'm doin' it.
translation.zh:
-是你叫我这样做的
-住手！我不要死

translation.en: I'm gonna die. I'm gonna die. Shrek, I'm gonna die.
translation.zh: 我要死了

translation.en: That'll do, Donkey. That'll do.
translation.zh: 不错啊 驴子

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: [Donkey] So where is this fire-breathing pain-in-the-neck anyway?
translation.zh: 那个火辣辣的家伙在哪里？

translation.en: Inside, waiting for us to rescue her.
translation.zh: 在里面 等我们去救

translation.en: [chuckles] I was talkin' about the dragon, Shrek.
translation.zh: 史瑞克 其实我说的是那条龙

translation.en: [Donkey whispering] You afraid?
translation.zh: 你怕不怕？

translation.en: No, but-- Shh.
translation.zh: 不怕 可是…

translation.en: Oh, good. Me neither. [gasps]
translation.zh: 我也不怕

translation.en: 'Cause there's nothin' wrong with bein' afraid.
translation.zh: 就算害怕也没有什么不对的

translation.en: Fear's a sensible response to an unfamiliar situation.
translation.zh: 害怕只是对陌生环境的基本反应

translation.en: Unfamiliar dangerous situation, I might add.
translation.zh: 更何况我们要面对的

translation.en: With a dragon that breathes fire and eats knights and breathes fire,
translation.zh: 是一条会喷火又会吃人的喷火龙

translation.en: it sure doesn't mean you're a coward if you're a little scared you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 害怕并不代表你是懦夫

translation.en: I sure as heck ain't no coward. I know that. [gasps]
translation.zh: 因为我可不是懦夫

translation.en: Donkey, two things, okay?
translation.zh: 驴子 两个字 好吗？

translation.en: Shut... up.
translation.zh: 闭…嘴

translation.en: Now go over there and see if you can find any stairs.
translation.zh: 你现在到那边看看有没有楼梯吧

translation.en: Stairs? I thought we was lookin' for the princess.
translation.zh: 楼梯？你不是应该叫我去找公主吗？

translation.en: The princess will be up the stairs in the highest room in the tallest tower.
translation.zh:
公主会在楼梯顶端的
最高塔的最高的房间里面

translation.en: -What makes you think she'll be there? -I read it in a book once.
translation.zh: 你怎么会这么确定她会在那里？ 我在书里看到的

translation.en: Cool. You handle the dragon. I'll handle the stairs.
translation.zh: 酷 你去对付龙 我去对付楼梯

translation.en: I'll find those stairs. I'll whip their butt too.
translation.zh:
我一定会找到楼梯
楼梯有什么了不起

translation.en: That's right. Those stairs won't know which way they're goin'.
translation.zh: 那些楼梯逃都逃不了

translation.en: I'm gonna take drastic steps.
translation.zh: 看我的无影脚 千万不要惹我

translation.en: Kick it to the kerb. Don't mess with me. I'm the stair master.
translation.zh: 看我的无影脚 千万不要惹我 我是楼梯之王 所有的楼梯都归我管

translation.en: I've mastered the stairs. I wish I had a step right here, right here.
translation.zh:
我是楼梯之王 所有的楼梯都归我管 真希望现在就能看到楼梯
来试试拳脚

translation.en: I'd step all over it.
translation.zh:
真希望现在就能看到楼梯
来试试拳脚

translation.en: Well, at least we know where the princess is, but where's the--
translation.zh:
公主应该就在那边了 -但怎么没看到…
-龙啊！

translation.en: Dragon! [screams]
translation.zh:
-但怎么没看到…
-龙啊！

translation.en: Donkey, look out! [screams]
translation.zh: 驴子 小心！

translation.en: -Got ya! -[roars]
translation.zh: 抓到你了！

translation.en: No. Oh, no. No! [screams]
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: -Oh, what large teeth you have. -[growls]
translation.zh: 你的牙好大哦

translation.en: I mean, white, sparkling teeth. I know you probably hear this all the time
translation.zh:
我是说 你的牙又白又亮 我相信你的食物
大概都曾经这样夸奖过你

translation.en: from your food, but you must bleach, or something, 'cause that is one dazzling smile you got there.
translation.zh:
你的牙齿一定做过美白
因为你笑起来太美了

translation.en: Do I detect a hint of minty freshness?
translation.zh: 而且我还闻到薄荷的香味

translation.en: And you know what else? You're-- You're a girl dragon!
translation.zh: 你知道还有什么吗？ 原来是小母龙啊！

translation.en: Oh, sure! I mean, of course you're a girl dragon.
translation.zh: 你当然是小母龙

translation.en: 'Cause, you're just reeking of feminine beauty.
translation.zh: 你的女人味简直太足了

translation.en: Uh, what's the matter with you? You got something in your eye?
translation.zh: 怎么了？眼睛里有东西吗？

translation.en: Man, I'd really love to stay, but, you know, I'm, uh-- [coughs]
translation.zh: 我是真的很想留下来 可是我有哮喘

translation.en: I'm an asthmatic, and I don't know if it'd work out
translation.zh:
我是真的很想留下来 可是我有哮喘 如果你经常这样吐烟圈
我不知道我到底受得了吗

translation.en: if you're gonna blow smoke rings and stuff.
translation.zh:
如果你经常这样吐烟圈
我不知道我到底受得了吗

translation.en: Shrek! [gasps]
translation.zh: 史瑞克！

translation.en: [whimpering] No! Shrek! Shrek!
translation.zh: 不要 史瑞克！

translation.en: -Wake up! -What?
translation.zh: 快起来！ 什么？

translation.en: Are you Princess Fiona?
translation.zh: 你是菲欧娜公主吗？

translation.en: I am, awaiting a knight so bold as to rescue me.
translation.zh: 我是 我正在等一个勇敢的骑士来救我

translation.en: Oh, that's nice. Now let's go!
translation.zh:
-真不错 我们快走！
-可是等一等

translation.en: But wait, Sir Knight.
translation.zh: 骑士先生

translation.en: This be-ith our first meeting.
translation.zh: 这是我们的初次见面

translation.en: Should it not be a wonderful, romantic moment?
translation.zh: 不是应该先好好地浪漫一下吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, sorry, lady. There's no time. -Hey, wait. What are you doing?
translation.zh:
是 很抱歉 姑娘 -我们没时间了
-等一下 干什么呀？

translation.en: You should sweep me off my feet,
translation.zh: 你应该用魅力将我迷倒

translation.en: out yonder window and down a rope onto your valiant steed.
translation.zh:
抱着我爬出窗外 沿着绳子爬下去
骑到你的骏马上

translation.en: You've had a lot of time to plan this, haven't you?
translation.zh:
你平常是不是很闲
所以才会想这么多？

translation.en: But we have to savour this moment!
translation.zh: 我们应该要把握这珍贵的一刻！

translation.en: You could recite an epic poem for me.
translation.zh: 你应该要给我吟一首诗才对的

translation.en: A ballad? A sonnet!
translation.zh: 十四行诗、打油诗

translation.en: -A limerick? Or something! -I don't think so.
translation.zh:
十四行诗、打油诗 -什么都可以！
-我看不必了

translation.en: Well, can I at least know the name of my champion?
translation.zh:
那我最起码可以知道
救我的人的名字吧？

translation.en: Um, Shrek.
translation.zh: 史瑞克

translation.en: Sir Shrek. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 史瑞克骑士

translation.en: I pray that you take this favour as a token of my gratitude.
translation.zh:
请你把这个当作
是我对你的情意和谢意

translation.en: Thanks!
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You didn't slay the dragon?
translation.zh: 你还没屠龙吗？

translation.en: -It's on my to-do list. Now come on! -[screams]
translation.zh: 等一下再说 快点走吧！

translation.en: [Fiona] But this isn't right!
translation.zh: 不是这样的！

translation.en: You were meant to charge in, sword drawn, banner flying.
translation.zh: 你应该是挥舞着宝剑 身上绑着彩带

translation.en: That's what all the other knights did. [Shrek] Yeah, right before they burst into flame.
translation.zh:
-所有其他的骑士都是这样做的
-是呀 那样的人都被龙烧死了

translation.en: That's not the point. Oh!
translation.zh: 这不是我说的重点

translation.en: Wait. Where are you going? The exit's over there.
translation.zh: 等一下 你要去哪里？出口在那边

translation.en: Well, I have to save my ass.
translation.zh: 我还得救小弟啊

translation.en: What kind of knight are you?
translation.zh: 你这算是哪门子的骑士啊？

translation.en: One of a kind.
translation.zh: 超特别的那种

translation.en: [Donkey] Slow down. Slow down, baby, please.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 不要急

translation.en: I believe it's healthy to get to know someone over a long period of time.
translation.zh:
我觉得我们应该交往一阵子
再决定要不要有进一步发展

translation.en: Just call me old-fashioned, you know. [laughs]
translation.zh: 你知道我的个性比较保守 我不想跟你

translation.en: I don't want to rush into a physical relationship.
translation.zh: 我不想跟你 这么快就有这个身体上的接触

translation.en: I'm not emotionally ready for a commitment of, uh, this, uh--
translation.zh: 我觉得 我还没爱到不能自拔…

translation.en: Magnitude really is the word I'm looking for.
translation.zh: 我觉得 我还没爱到不能自拔… 我还在等待心跳的感觉

translation.en: Magnitude--Hey, that is unwanted physical contact.
translation.zh: 我还在等待心跳的感觉 你还这样摸我

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 你要干吗？

translation.en: Okay, okay. Let's just back up a little and take this one step at a time.
translation.zh: 我们应该一步一步来

translation.en: We really should get to know each other first as friends or pen pals.
translation.zh: 我们可以先当朋友啊 笔友也行

translation.en: 'Cause I'm on the road a lot, but I just love receiving cards--
translation.zh:
因为我常常奔波
能收到明信片我肯定很高兴

translation.en: Hey, you know I'd really love to stay, but--
translation.zh: 你知道 我真的好想留下 不要这样

translation.en: Hey, hey! Don't do that! That's my tail! That's my personal tail.
translation.zh: 那是我的尾巴 你快把它扯下来了

translation.en: You're gonna tear it off. I don't give permission--
translation.zh:
那是我的尾巴 你快把它扯下来了 我没答应你可以碰它
你到底想对它怎么样！

translation.en: What are you gonna do with that?
translation.zh:
我没答应你可以碰它
你到底想对它怎么样！

translation.en: Hey, now. No way. No! No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: No, no! No. No, no, no! No! Oh!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: -Hi, Princess! -It talks!
translation.zh:
-嗨 公主！
-它会说话！

translation.en: Yeah, it's getting him to shut up that's the trick.
translation.zh: 没错 可是要他静下来真的很难

translation.en: Okay, you two, head for the exit!
translation.zh: 你们俩个直接跑到出口去吧！

translation.en: I'll take care of the dragon.
translation.zh: 这条龙就由我来解决吧

translation.en: [echoing] Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: -[dragon growling in the distance] -You did it!
translation.zh: 你成功了！

translation.en: You rescued me! You're amazing. You're--
translation.zh: 你救了我！你太了不起了 你实在太棒了！你…

translation.en: You're wonderful. You're...
translation.zh: 你实在太棒了！你…

translation.en: a little unorthodox I'll admit.
translation.zh: 你虽然不太正统 但…

translation.en: But thy deed is great, and thine heart is pure.
translation.zh: 可是你拥有一颗诚实高贵的心

translation.en: -I am eternally in your debt. -[clears throat]
translation.zh: 你真是我的大恩人

translation.en: And where would a brave knight be without his noble steed?
translation.zh:
当然一个英勇的骑士怎么可以
缺少高贵的骏马呢？

translation.en: I hope you heard that. She called me a noble steed.
translation.zh: 你听到了吗 她说我是高贵的骏马！

translation.en: She thinks I'm a steed.
translation.zh: 她觉得我是骏马

translation.en: [Fiona laughs] The battle is won.
translation.zh: 她觉得我是骏马 战斗已经结束了

translation.en: You may remove your helmet, good Sir Knight.
translation.zh:
你可以拿下你的头盔了
英勇的骑士先生

translation.en: -Uh, no. -Why not?
translation.zh: 不行 为什么不行？

translation.en: I have helmet hair.
translation.zh: 我头发被压扁了

translation.en: Please. I would'st look upon the face of my rescuer.
translation.zh:
求求你 我想看看救我的人
长什么样子

translation.en: No, no, you wouldn't-- 'st.
translation.zh: 不 你一定不会想的

translation.en: But how will you kiss me?
translation.zh: 那你这样子怎么亲我啊

translation.en: What? That wasn't in the job description.
translation.zh: 什么？职责说明里没提这个啊

translation.en: Maybe it's a perk.
translation.zh:
-也许是额外的奖赏
-不是 这是命运

translation.en: No, it's destiny. Oh, you must know how it goes.
translation.zh:
-也许是额外的奖赏
-不是 这是命运 你一定知道事情会怎样发展

translation.en: A princess locked in a tower and beset by a dragon...
translation.zh: 公主被锁在高塔上 被一只龙看守着

translation.en: is rescued by a brave knight,
translation.zh: 一个英勇的骑士救了她

translation.en: and then they share true love's first kiss.
translation.zh:
然后骑士会为了她献上
真爱的第一个吻

translation.en: Hmm? With Shrek? You think-- Wait.
translation.zh: 跟史瑞克？你是说…等一下

translation.en: Wait. You think that Shrek is your true love?
translation.zh: 等等 你以为说史瑞克是你的真爱？

translation.en: Well, yes.
translation.zh: 对啊！

translation.en: You think Shrek is your true love!
translation.zh: 你以为史瑞克是你的真爱？

translation.en: What is so funny?
translation.zh: 这个有什么好笑的？

translation.en: Let's just say I'm not your type, okay?
translation.zh: 我不是你喜欢的类型 好吗？

translation.en: Of course, you are. You're my rescuer.
translation.zh: 你当然是了 你是我的救命恩人

translation.en: Now-- Now remove your helmet.
translation.zh: 好了 赶快拿下你头盔吧

translation.en: Look. I really don't think this is a good idea.
translation.zh: 听着 我觉得这样做不太好

translation.en: -Just take off the helmet. -I'm not going to.
translation.zh:
-把你的头盔拿掉
-不要

translation.en: -Take it off. -No!
translation.zh:
-快点 拿下来！
-不要

translation.en: -Now! -Okay!
translation.zh:
-马上！
-好了！

translation.en: Easy. As you command, Your Highness.
translation.zh: 冷静点 听您的命令 公主殿下

translation.en: You-- You're a-- an ogre.
translation.zh: 你…你是个怪物

translation.en: Oh, you were expecting Prince Charming.
translation.zh: 原来你在等英俊的白马王子吗？

translation.en: Well, yes, actually.
translation.zh: 老实说 是的

translation.en: Oh, no. This is all wrong.
translation.zh: 不 这完全不对

translation.en: You're not supposed to be an ogre.
translation.zh: 你不应该是个怪物的

translation.en: [sighs] Princess, I was sent to rescue you by Lord Farquaad, okay?
translation.zh:
公主 我是法克大人
派来救你的 好吗？

translation.en: He's the one who wants to marry you.
translation.zh: 他才是真正想娶你的人

translation.en: Then why didn't he come rescue me?
translation.zh: 那他为什么不自己来救我呢？

translation.en: Good question. You should ask him that when we get there.
translation.zh:
问得好 等你见到他之后
你再去问他

translation.en: But I have to be rescued by my true love,
translation.zh: 可是我必须被真正爱我的人拯救

translation.en: not by some ogre and his-- his pet.
translation.zh: 而不是一个怪物跟他的宠物

translation.en: Well, so much for noble steed.
translation.zh: 好吧 我不再是什么高贵的骏马了

translation.en: Look princess, you're not making my job any easier.
translation.zh: 公主 你在给我的任务找麻烦

translation.en: I'm sorry, but your job is not my problem.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 你的任务可不关我的事

translation.en: You can tell Lord Farquaad that if he wants to rescue me properly,
translation.zh:
你去告诉那个法克大人
如果他真有心想要来拯救我的话

translation.en: I'll be waiting for him right here.
translation.zh: 我就在这里等他

translation.en: Hey! I'm no one's messenger boy, all right? I'm a delivery boy.
translation.zh: 嘿 我可不是送信的小弟 好吗？ 我是快递哥

translation.en: You wouldn't dare.
translation.zh: 你要怎么样

translation.en: -[shrieks] Put me down! -Ya comin', Donkey?
translation.zh:
-驴子？走吧？
-放我下来

translation.en: I'm right behind ya.
translation.zh: 好 我就在你后面

translation.en: Put me down, or you will suffer the consequences!
translation.zh:
快放我下来
要不然我会让你倒大霉的！

translation.en: This is not dignified! Put me down! [screams]
translation.zh: 你真是太粗鲁了 放我下来！

translation.en: [Donkey] Okay, so here's another question.
translation.zh: 我又有个问题

translation.en: Say there's a woman that digs you, right, but you don't really like her that way.
translation.zh:
如果有个女孩子对你有兴趣
可是你并不是那么喜欢她

translation.en: How do you let her down real easy so her feelings aren't hurt,
translation.zh:
那你应该怎么样婉转地拒绝她
才不会伤害到她？

translation.en: but you don't get burned to a crisp and eaten? How you do that?
translation.zh:
也不会被她吃掉或者烤焦？
要怎么讲？

translation.en: You just tell her she's not your true love.
translation.zh: 直说就好了

translation.en: Everyone knowest what happens when you find your--
translation.zh: 每个人只有碰到真正喜欢的人才会…

translation.en: The sooner we get to DuLoc the better.
translation.zh: 越快到杜罗克越好

translation.en: Oh, you're gonna love it there, Princess. It's beautiful!
translation.zh:
公主 你一定会喜欢那里
那里美极了！

translation.en: And what of my groom-to-be? Lord Farquaad? What's he like?
translation.zh:
那我的新郎法克大人
他是怎么样的人？

translation.en: Well, Let me put it this way, Princess.
translation.zh: 让我这样说好了 公主

translation.en: Men of Farquaad's stature are in short supply.
translation.zh:
就法克大人那样的人
只能说是短小 精干

translation.en: I don't know. There are those who think little of him.
translation.zh: 我不知道啊 史瑞克 有人会觉得他有缺陷

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it, both of you.
translation.zh: 够了 你们不准再笑了

translation.en: You're just jealous you can never measure up to a great ruler like Lord Farquaad.
translation.zh:
你是在嫉妒
因为你永远都不可能成为 -像法克大人这样伟岸的统治者
-是啊

translation.en: Yeah, well, maybe you're right, Princess.
translation.zh:
-像法克大人这样伟岸的统治者
-是啊 或许你说得没错 公主

translation.en: But I'll let you do the "measuring" when you see him tomorrow.
translation.zh:
等你明天见到他的时候
你就知道他有“伟岸”了

translation.en: Tomorrow? It'll take that long?
translation.zh: 明天？ 要这么久吗？

translation.en: -Shouldn't we stop to make camp? -No, that'll take longer.
translation.zh:
-那我们应该搭个帐篷过夜？
-不行 那会更耽误时间了 我们继续前进

translation.en: -We can keep going. -But there's robbers in the woods.
translation.zh: 那会更耽误时间了 我们继续前进 可是森林里面有强盗啊

translation.en: Whoa! Time out, Shrek! Camping's starting to sound good.
translation.zh: 还是搭帐篷吧

translation.en: Hey, come on. I'm scarier than anything we're going to see in this forest.
translation.zh:
嘿 拜托 在森林里还能遇到什么
比我更可怕的东西？

translation.en: I need to find somewhere to camp now!
translation.zh: 我现在就要找一个地方过夜！

translation.en: -Hey! Over here. -Shrek, we can do better than that.
translation.zh: 嘿！过来吧！ 史瑞克 这里实在太寒酸了

translation.en: I don't think this is fit for a princess.
translation.zh: 我觉得公主不会留在这里过夜

translation.en: No, no, it's perfect. It just needs a few homey touches.
translation.zh:
不 这里很好
只要再来一点家的感觉就好了

translation.en: -Homey touches? Like what? -[crashing]
translation.zh: 家的感觉？是什么感觉？

translation.en: A door? Well, gentlemen, I bid thee good night.
translation.zh:
一扇门 好了 两位先生
我要跟你们说晚安了

translation.en: You want me to read you a bedtime story? I will.
translation.zh:
是不是要我讲个 -睡前故事给你听…
-我说过晚安了！

translation.en: [Fiona] I said good night!
translation.zh:
-睡前故事给你听…
-我说过晚安了！

translation.en: Shrek, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 史瑞克 你在干吗？

translation.en: [laughs] I just-- You know-- Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 你知道的… 只想开个玩笑

translation.en: I was just kidding.
translation.zh: 只想开个玩笑

translation.en: [Shrek] And, uh, that one, that's Throwback,
translation.zh:
你看那个 那是斯洛白克
是唯一在三个麦田吐过痰的怪物

translation.en: the only ogre to ever spit over three wheat fields.
translation.zh:
那是斯洛白克
是唯一在三个麦田吐过痰的怪物

translation.en: Right. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 是的

translation.en: Hey, can you tell my future from these stars?
translation.zh: 你可以用这些星星帮我算命吗？

translation.en: The stars don't tell the future, Donkey. They tell stories.
translation.zh: 星星不是用来算命的 驴子 它们是会讲故事的

translation.en: Look, there's Bloodnut, the Flatulent.
translation.zh: 你看 那是布拉纳特 臭臭王

translation.en: -You can guess what he's famous for. -I know you're making this up.
translation.zh:
你能猜到他为何这么出名 -我知道你是瞎编的
-不是

translation.en: No, look. There he is, and there's the group of hunters running away from his stench.
translation.zh:
你看 他就在那里 旁边有一群猎人
因为他太臭 都被熏跑了

translation.en: That ain't nothin' but a bunch of little dots.
translation.zh: 那都是一些小点点而已

translation.en: You know Donkey, sometimes things are more than they appear.
translation.zh:
你知道吗 驴子 有的时候
看东西是不能光看外表的

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.zh: 算了吧

translation.en: Hey, Shrek, what we gonna do when we get our swamp anyway?
translation.zh:
嘿 史瑞克 等我们的沼泽要回来以后
我们要做什么？

translation.en: Our swamp?
translation.zh:
-“我们”的沼泽？
-你知道

translation.en: You know, when we're through rescuing the princess and all that stuff.
translation.zh: 就是等我们救公主这事结束以后

translation.en: We? Donkey, there's no "we." There's no "our."
translation.zh: “我们”？驴子 不要再说“我们” 也不要再说“我们的”

translation.en: There's just me and my swamp.
translation.zh: 只有“我”跟“我的沼泽”

translation.en: The first thing I'm gonna do is build a ten-foot wall around my land.
translation.zh:
我要做的第一件事就是
盖个超级大的围墙把沼泽围起来

translation.en: You cut me deep, Shrek.
translation.zh: 你伤害到我了 史瑞克

translation.en: You cut me real deep just now.
translation.zh: 你伤得我好深好深

translation.en: You know what I think?
translation.zh: 你知道我怎么想的吗？

translation.en: I think this whole wall thing is just a way to keep somebody out.
translation.zh:
我觉得盖围墙的确
可以让人家都找不到你

translation.en: -No, do ya think? -Are you hidin' something?
translation.zh:
不是 你是这么想吗？ -你在躲什么人吗？
-算了吧 驴子

translation.en: Never mind, Donkey.
translation.zh:
-你在躲什么人吗？
-算了吧 驴子

translation.en: Oh, this is another one of those onion things, isn't it?
translation.zh:
-这跟你说的什么洋葱有关 对吧？
-不是

translation.en: No, this is one of those drop-it and leave-it-alone things.
translation.zh: 你别刨根问底了

translation.en: -Why don't you want to talk about it? -Why do you want to talk about it?
translation.zh:
-你为什么不让我问呢？
-那你为什么老要一直追着我问呢？

translation.en: Why are you blocking? I'm not blocking.
translation.zh:
-你到底在躲什么？
-我没有躲啊

translation.en: Oh, yes, you are. Donkey, I'm warning you.
translation.zh:
-你有
-驴子 我警告你

translation.en: -Who you trying to keep out? -Everyone! Okay?
translation.zh: 你到底在躲谁吗？快说 所有的人！好不好？

translation.en: Oh, now we're gettin' somewhere.
translation.zh: 这还差不多

translation.en: Oh! For the love of Pete!
translation.zh: 请不要再烦了

translation.en: What's your problem? What you got against the whole world anyway, huh?
translation.zh:
你有什么问题？
为什么你要这么讨厌所有的人？

translation.en: Look, I'm not the one with the problem, okay?
translation.zh: 有问题的人不是我 懂吗？

translation.en: It's the world that seems to have a problem with me.
translation.zh: 是这个有问题的世界老要跟我作对

translation.en: People take one look at me and go, "Aah! Help! Run!
translation.zh:
每个人看到我都会大叫 “救命 快跑！
又大又丑又蠢的怪物”

translation.en: A big, stupid, ugly ogre!"
translation.zh:
“救命 快跑！
又大又丑又蠢的怪物”

translation.en: [sighs] They judge me before they even know me.
translation.zh: 他们只看我外表就给我下结论

translation.en: That's why I'm better off alone.
translation.zh: 所以我自己待着比较好

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: When we met, I didn't think you was just a big, stupid, ugly ogre.
translation.zh:
我遇到你时 我一点都不觉得
你是“又大又丑又蠢的怪物”

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: So, uh, are there any donkeys up there?
translation.zh: 天上有没有驴子呢？

translation.en: Well, there's, um, Gabby, the Small and Annoying.
translation.zh: 有个叫盖比的 最小的 废话最多的

translation.en: Okay, okay, I see it now, yeah. The big shiny one, right there. That one there?
translation.zh: 是最大最亮的那一颗 就在那边 那边那颗

translation.en: -That's the moon. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh:
-那是月亮
-好吧

translation.en: [Farquaad] Again. Show me again.
translation.zh: 再让我看一次

translation.en: Mirror, mirror, show her to me. Show me the princess.
translation.zh: 魔镜 再让我看一次 再看公主一眼

translation.en: Ah. Perfect. [inhales]
translation.zh: 太完美了

translation.en: [Donkey] Mmm, yeah, you know I like it like that.
translation.zh: 我就喜欢这样

translation.en: -Come on, baby. I said I like it. -Donkey, wake up.
translation.zh: 来吧 宝贝 我说了我喜欢 驴子 起来

translation.en: -Huh? What? -Wake up.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-起来了

translation.en: -What? -[Fiona] Good morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: Um, how do you like your eggs?
translation.zh: 蛋要怎么个吃法？

translation.en: -Good morning, Princess! -What's all this about?
translation.zh: 早安 公主！ 这个是怎么回事？

translation.en: You know, we kind of got off to a bad start yesterday and...
translation.zh: 是这样的 我们昨天相处得不太融洽

translation.en: I wanted to make it up to you.
translation.zh: 今天我想补偿一下

translation.en: I mean, after all, you did rescue me.
translation.zh: 我是说毕竟… 你是我的救命恩人

translation.en: -Uh, thanks. -[sniffs]
translation.zh: 谢谢 快吃吧

translation.en: Well, eat up. We've got a big day ahead of us.
translation.zh: 快吃吧 等一下还得赶路呢

translation.en: -[belches] -Shrek! What? It's a compliment.
translation.zh:
-史瑞克
-干吗？这是一种赞美啊

translation.en: Better out than in, I always say. [laughs]
translation.zh: 总比憋着好

translation.en: Well, it's no way to behave in front of a princess.
translation.zh: 在公主面前打嗝没礼貌

translation.en: -Thanks. -She's as nasty as you are.
translation.zh: 谢谢 她跟你一样恶心

translation.en: You know, you're not exactly what I expected.
translation.zh: 你知道 你真的跟我想像的差很多

translation.en: Well, maybe you shouldn't judge people before you get to know them.
translation.zh: 你不应该光看一个人的外表就下定论

translation.en: [man] La liberte! Hey!
translation.zh:
-嘿！
-公主！

translation.en: -[laughs] -What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你要干什么？

translation.en: Be still, mon cherie, for I am your saviour!
translation.zh: 待好别动 美女

translation.en: And I am rescuing you from this green-- [kissing sounds]
translation.zh: 我要把你从这绿色怪物的手中…

translation.en: -beast. -[Shrek] Hey!
translation.zh: 给拯救出来 这是我的公主！你去找你自己的！

translation.en: That's my princess! Go find your own!
translation.zh: 这是我的公主！你去找你自己的！

translation.en: Please, monster! Can't you see I'm a little busy here?
translation.zh:
拜托 怪物 难倒你没有看见
我现在正在忙吗？

translation.en: Look, pal, I don't know who you think you are!
translation.zh:
好了 老兄 我不知道
你把自己当成什么了！

translation.en: Oh! Of course! Oh, how rude.
translation.zh: 我真是太失礼了

translation.en: Please let me introduce myself.
translation.zh: 我来介绍一下自己

translation.en: Oh, Merry Men! [laughs]
translation.zh: 兄弟们！

translation.en: ♪ I steal from the rich And give to the needy ♪
translation.zh: 我劫富济贫

translation.en: -♪ He takes a wee percentage ♪ -♪ But I'm not greedy ♪
translation.zh:
-他就揩一点小油
-但我不贪心

translation.en: ♪ I rescue pretty damsels Man I'm good ♪
translation.zh: 我解救美丽的少女 我真是厉害

translation.en: -♪ What a guy Monsieur Hood -♪ Break it down ♪
translation.zh:
多棒啊 -罗宾汉先生
-细细道来

translation.en: ♪ I like an honest fight And a saucy little maid ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢公平竞争也爱美女

translation.en: ♪ What he's basically saying is He likes to get-- ♪ ♪ Paid ♪
translation.zh: 他是说他想要报酬

translation.en: ♪ So when an ogre in the bush Grabs a lady by the tush ♪
translation.zh:
-所以
-当怪物出现在树林中时 挟持少女 这可不太好

translation.en: -♪ That's bad ♪ -♪ That's bad, that's bad, that's bad ♪
translation.zh:
-这可不太好
-这可不太好

translation.en: ♪ When a beauty's with a beast it makes me awfully mad ♪
translation.zh: 美女和野兽在一起 会让我气恼

translation.en: ♪ He's mad He's really really mad ♪
translation.zh: 他气得不行

translation.en: ♪ I'll take my blade and Ram it through your heart ♪
translation.zh: 我会拿刀子捅穿你的心

translation.en: ♪ Keep your eyes on me boys 'cause I'm about to start ♪
translation.zh: 注意看了 兄弟们 我要开始了

translation.en: [panting] Man, that was annoying!
translation.zh: 唱得真难听

translation.en: Oh, you little--
translation.zh: 你这个…

translation.en: [chuckles] Um, shall we?
translation.zh: 我们走吧？

translation.en: -Hold the phone. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hold on now.
translation.zh: 等一下 你这套拳法是怎么来的？

translation.en: -Where did that come from? -What?
translation.zh:
等一下 你这套拳法是怎么来的？ -哪一套！
-那一套啊

translation.en: That! Back there. That was amazing!
translation.zh:
-哪一套！
-那一套啊 你这么会打啊！

translation.en: [Shrek] Where did you learn that?
translation.zh:
-你是从哪里学来的？
-这个嘛

translation.en: Well-- [chuckles] When one lives alone,
translation.zh:
-你是从哪里学来的？
-这个嘛 如果你都是一个人住
就应该学点防身术嘛

translation.en: uh, one has to learn these things in case there's a--
translation.zh:
如果你都是一个人住
就应该学点防身术嘛 以免…

translation.en: -There's an arrow in your butt! -What?
translation.zh:
-你的屁股中箭了！
-什么？

translation.en: -Oh, would you look at that? -Oh, no. This is all my fault.
translation.zh:
-瞧瞧？
-不好了 都是我害的 抱歉

translation.en: I'm so sorry. Why? What's wrong?
translation.zh:
都是我害的 抱歉 -怎么了？
-史瑞克受伤了

translation.en: -Shrek's hurt. -Shrek's hurt. Shrek's hurt?
translation.zh: 史瑞克受伤？ 史瑞克受伤了！

translation.en: Oh, no, Shrek's gonna die.
translation.zh:
-你千万不能死 史瑞克
-驴子 我没事

translation.en: -Donkey, I'm okay. -You can't do this to me, Shrek.
translation.zh:
-你千万不能死 史瑞克
-驴子 我没事 你死了 我会受不了的
你赶快躺下来 我帮你瞧瞧

translation.en: I'm too young for you to die. Keep your legs elevated. Turn your head and cough.
translation.zh:
你死了 我会受不了的
你赶快躺下来 我帮你瞧瞧

translation.en: -Does anyone know the Heimlich? -Donkey! Calm down.
translation.zh:
-哪里有医生哦？
-驴子 冷静点

translation.en: If you want to help Shrek,
translation.zh: 如果你想帮史瑞克的忙

translation.en: run into the woods and find me a blue flower with red thorns.
translation.zh:
那你就去树林里找一些
有红刺的蓝花给我

translation.en: Blue flower, red thorns. Okay, I'm on it. Blue flower, red thorns.
translation.zh:
有红刺的蓝花 好的 我去找 有红刺的蓝花 有红刺的蓝花
不要死 史瑞克

translation.en: Blue flower, red thorns.
translation.zh:
有红刺的蓝花 有红刺的蓝花
不要死 史瑞克

translation.en: Don't die, Shrek. If you see a long tunnel, stay away from the light!
translation.zh: 如果意识模糊 试图清醒过来

translation.en: -[both] Donkey! -Oh, yeah. Right. Blue flower, red thorns.
translation.zh:
-驴子
-驴子 对了 有红刺的蓝花

translation.en: -Blue flower, red thorns. -What are the flowers for?
translation.zh: 对了 有红刺的蓝花 那个花是做什么用的？

translation.en: -For getting rid of Donkey. -Ah.
translation.zh: 是用来打发驴子的

translation.en: Now you hold still, and I'll yank this thing out.
translation.zh: 你乖乖的别动 我帮你把箭拔出来

translation.en: Ow! Hey! Easy with the yankin'.
translation.zh:
-你轻一点
-抱歉 可是箭一定要拔出来

translation.en: -I'm sorry, but it has to come out. -No, it's tender.
translation.zh:
-你轻一点
-抱歉 可是箭一定要拔出来 -快点 让我拔…
-不 轻一点

translation.en: Now, hold on.
translation.zh:
-快点 让我拔…
-不 轻一点

translation.en: -What you're doing is the opposite of help -Don't move.
translation.zh: 你这样 只会越帮越忙的

translation.en: -Okay, look, look, time out. -Would you--
translation.zh: 好了 停！ 你给我…

translation.en: [grunts] Okay. What do you propose we do?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你说我们该怎么办呢？

translation.en: Blue flower, red thorns. Blue flower, red thorns. Blue flower, red thorns.
translation.zh: 红刺的蓝花

translation.en: This would be so much easier if I wasn't colour-blind!
translation.zh: 如果我不是色盲的话我早就找到了

translation.en: -Blue flower, red thorns. -[Shrek] Ow!
translation.zh: 红刺的蓝花

translation.en: Hold on, Shrek! I'm comin'!
translation.zh: 史瑞克 坚持住 我回来了

translation.en: Ow! Not good.
translation.zh:
-不太妙
-好

translation.en: -Okay. Okay, I can nearly see the head. -[grunts]
translation.zh:
好了 我已经拔到箭头了
只要再一下就好了

translation.en: Nothing happened. We were just, uh--
translation.zh: 我们什么都没做 我们只是…

translation.en: Look, if you wanted to be alone, all you had to do was ask, okay.
translation.zh:
听说 如果你们想要独处
只要给我说一声就好了

translation.en: Oh, come on! That's the last thing on my mind.
translation.zh:
拜托 我可是一点这个念头都没有
刚刚公主只是在帮我把这个…

translation.en: The princess here was just-- Ugh!
translation.zh:
我可是一点这个念头都没有
刚刚公主只是在帮我把这个…

translation.en: -Ow! -Hey, what's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: [nervous chuckle] That's-- Is that blood?
translation.zh: 那是…血吗？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: There it is, Princess.
translation.zh: 到了 公主

translation.en: Your future awaits you.
translation.zh:
-你的未来在等着你
-那是杜罗克吗？

translation.en: -That's DuLoc? -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh:
-你的未来在等着你
-那是杜罗克吗？ 是的 没错
史瑞克觉得法克大人是在择长补短

translation.en: You know, Shrek thinks Lord Farquaad's compensating for something,
translation.zh:
是的 没错
史瑞克觉得法克大人是在择长补短

translation.en: which I think means he has a really-- Ow!
translation.zh: 我猜他的意思应该是法克大人…

translation.en: Um, I, uh--
translation.zh: 我想…

translation.en: -I guess we better move on. -Sure.
translation.zh:
-我们还是快点动身吧
-好啊

translation.en: But, Shrek?
translation.zh: 可是 史瑞克？我…

translation.en: -I'm-- I'm worried about Donkey. -[blubbering]
translation.zh:
可是 史瑞克？我… -我有点担心驴子
-什么？

translation.en: -What? -I mean, look at him.
translation.zh: 我是说 你看他

translation.en: -He doesn't look so good. -What are you talking about? I'm fine.
translation.zh:
-他看起来气色不太好
-你在胡说什么？我很好

translation.en: That's what they always say, and then next thing you know, you're on your back.
translation.zh: 一般人总这么说的 可是接下来 你会马上倒下去

translation.en: -Dead. -You know, she's right.
translation.zh:
-死掉
-她说得很有道理

translation.en: You look awful. Do you want to sit down?
translation.zh: 你的脸色不好 你要不要休息一下？

translation.en: -You know, I'll make you some tea. -I didn't want to say nothin' but,
translation.zh:
我可以泡茶给你喝 我本来不想说的
我常常觉得脖子痛痛的

translation.en: I got this twinge in my neck, and when I turn my head like this, look.
translation.zh:
我本来不想说的
我常常觉得脖子痛痛的 只要像这样弯一下 看

translation.en: -[bones crunch] -Ow! See?
translation.zh: 只要像这样弯一下 看

translation.en: -Who's hungry? I'll find us some dinner. -I'll get the firewood.
translation.zh:
-有人饿吗？我去弄晚餐来
-我去找木头来生火

translation.en: Hey, where you goin'? Oh, man, I can't feel my toes!
translation.zh: 你们去哪里？ 天啊 我脚趾头一点知觉都没了！

translation.en: I don't have any toes!
translation.zh: 我没有脚趾头！

translation.en: I think I need a hug.
translation.zh: 我需要抱抱

translation.en: Mmm. This is good. This is really good.
translation.zh: 很好吃 真是太好吃了

translation.en: -What is this? -Uh, weedrat.
translation.zh: 这是什么？ 那是田鼠

translation.en: Rotisserie style.
translation.zh: 烤肉的风格

translation.en: Well, this is delicious.
translation.zh: 的确很好吃

translation.en: Well, they're also great in stews.
translation.zh: 炖也不错

translation.en: Now, I don't mean to brag, but I make a mean weedrat stew.
translation.zh:
告诉你 不是我在吹牛
我炖田鼠肉是一流的

translation.en: [sighs] I guess I'll be dining a little differently tomorrow night.
translation.zh:
我想明天开始
我就吃不到这样的晚餐了

translation.en: [gulps] Maybe you can come visit me in the swamp sometime.
translation.zh:
如果你有空的话
也可以到沼泽来看看我

translation.en: I'll cook all kinds of stuff for you.
translation.zh: 我会煮各式各样的东西给你吃

translation.en: Swamp toad soup, fish eye tartare, you name it.
translation.zh: 沼泽蟾蜍汤 鱼眼肉丸…随便你点

translation.en: [chuckles] I'd like that.
translation.zh: 我很期待

translation.en: Um, Princess?
translation.zh: 公主？

translation.en: Yes, Shrek?
translation.zh: 什么事 史瑞克？

translation.en: I, um, I was wondering.
translation.zh: 我… 我在想不知道你…

translation.en: Are you...
translation.zh: 我在想不知道你…

translation.en: [sighs] Are you gonna eat that?
translation.zh: 还吃不吃这只？

translation.en: Man, isn't this romantic? Just look at that sunset.
translation.zh:
天哪 真是太有情调了
看夕阳多漂亮

translation.en: Sunset?
translation.zh: 夕阳！不！

translation.en: Oh, no! I mean, it's late.
translation.zh: 夕阳！不！ 我是说 很晚了

translation.en: -I-- It's very late. -What?
translation.zh:
-真的很晚了
-什么？

translation.en: Wait a minute. I see what's goin' on here.
translation.zh: 等一下 我知道怎么回事了

translation.en: -You're afraid of the dark, aren't you? -Yes!
translation.zh:
-你怕黑 对不对？
-没错！

translation.en: Yes, that's it. I'm terrified. You know, I'd better go inside.
translation.zh:
没错 就是这样子 我快吓死了 -我想我最好进去躲起来
-你不用觉得不好意思 公主

translation.en: Don't feel bad, Princess. I used to be afraid of the dark, too, until--
translation.zh:
-我想我最好进去躲起来
-你不用觉得不好意思 公主 我以前也是很怕黑 直到…

translation.en: Hey, no, wait. I'm still afraid of the dark.
translation.zh: 等等 我现在还是很怕黑啊

translation.en: -[Shrek sighs] -Good night. Good night.
translation.zh:
-晚安
-晚安

translation.en: Now I really see what's goin' on here.
translation.zh: 我想我知道你们是怎么回事了

translation.en: Oh, what are you talkin' about?
translation.zh: 你在胡说什么

translation.en: Hey, I don't even wanna hear it. Look, I'm an animal, and I got instincts.
translation.zh: 我是动物 我有动物的直觉

translation.en: And I know you two were diggin' on each other. I could feel it.
translation.zh: 我知道你们两个都对彼此有意思

translation.en: Oh, you're crazy. I'm just bringing her back to Farquaad.
translation.zh:
你疯了吧
我只是把她带回去交给法克

translation.en: Oh, come on, Shrek. Wake up and smell the pheromones.
translation.zh: 少来了 史瑞克 你们之间来电了

translation.en: -Just go on in and tell her how you feel. -I--
translation.zh:
-快进去告诉她你的感觉
-我…

translation.en: There's nothing to tell. Besides, even if I did tell her that,
translation.zh: 我没有什么可说的 就算我真的跟她说我…你知道…

translation.en: well, you know--
translation.zh: 就算我真的跟她说我…你知道…

translation.en: and I'm not sayin' I do 'cause I don't--
translation.zh:
我不是说我对她有意思
因为我没有…

translation.en: she's a princess, and I'm-- An ogre?
translation.zh:
-她是一个公主 而我…
-是怪物吗？

translation.en: Yeah. An ogre.
translation.zh: 是啊 我是怪物

translation.en: -Hey, where you goin'? -To get... more firewood.
translation.zh:
-嘿 你去哪里？
-去找木头来生火

translation.en: Princess?
translation.zh: 公主？

translation.en: Princess Fiona?
translation.zh: 菲欧娜公主？

translation.en: Princess, where are you?
translation.zh: 公主 你在哪里？

translation.en: Princess?
translation.zh: 公主？

translation.en: It's very spooky in here. I ain't playing no games.
translation.zh: 这里很恐怖 别闹了

translation.en: -Aah! No, help! -Oh, no!
translation.zh:
-不要叫！
-救命！

translation.en: -Shh! -Shrek! Shrek! -Shrek! -No, it's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh:
-史瑞克！
-没事

translation.en: -What did you do with the princess? -Donkey, I'm the princess.
translation.zh:
-你把公主怎么了？
-驴子 我就是公主

translation.en: -Aah! -It's me, in this body.
translation.zh: 是我 在这身体里面

translation.en: Oh, my God! You ate the princess!
translation.zh: 我的天！你把公主吃掉了

translation.en: -Can you hear me? -Donkey!
translation.zh:
听得到吗？ -是我 驴子
-撑下去！

translation.en: -Listen, keep breathing! -No!
translation.zh:
-是我 驴子
-撑下去！ -不
-我会救你出来 史瑞克！

translation.en: I'll get you out of there!
translation.zh:
-不
-我会救你出来 史瑞克！

translation.en: -Shrek! Shrek! Shrek! -Shh.
translation.zh:
-不
-我会救你出来 史瑞克！ 史瑞克！

translation.en: -Shrek! -This is me.
translation.zh:
-史瑞克
-真的是我

translation.en: Princess?
translation.zh: 公主？

translation.en: What happened to you? You're, uh, uh,
translation.zh: 发生什么事了？你变了…

translation.en: uh, different.
translation.zh:
-不一样了
-我变丑了 行了吗？

translation.en: -I'm ugly, okay? -Well, yeah!
translation.zh:
-不一样了
-我变丑了 行了吗？ 难道是吃错了什么东西？

translation.en: Was it something you ate? 'Cause I told Shrek those rats was a bad idea.
translation.zh: 难道是吃错了什么东西？ 我跟史瑞克说过吃田鼠不是个好主意

translation.en: -You are what you eat, I said. Now-- -No.
translation.zh:
-饮食很重要…
-不

translation.en: I-- I've been this way as long as I can remember.
translation.zh: 从我有记忆以来 我就是这个样子

translation.en: What do you mean? Look, I ain't never seen you like this before.
translation.zh:
什么意思？
我认识你的时候可不是这个样子

translation.en: It only happens when the sun goes down.
translation.zh: 我只有在太阳下山以后才会变成这样

translation.en: By night one way, by day another.
translation.zh:
晚上是这样
白天就变成正常人的样子

translation.en: This shall be the norm...
translation.zh: 一直是这样

translation.en: until you find true love's first kiss...
translation.zh: 唯有找到真爱的第一个吻

translation.en: and then take love's true form."
translation.zh: 才能永远的变成真身

translation.en: Ah, that's beautiful. I didn't know you wrote poetry.
translation.zh: 好词 我不知道你还会写诗

translation.en: It's a spell.
translation.zh: 这是咒语

translation.en: [sighs] When I was a little girl, a witch cast a spell on me.
translation.zh:
当我还很小的时候
一个女巫给我下了个咒语

translation.en: Every night I become this.
translation.zh: 只要一到晚上我就会变成这样

translation.en: This horrible, ugly beast!
translation.zh: 变成一个可怕丑陋的怪物

translation.en: I was placed in a tower to await the day my true love would rescue me.
translation.zh:
我被安排在高塔上
等待有一天我的真爱会来救我

translation.en: That's why I have to marry Lord Farquaad tomorrow,
translation.zh: 这就是为什么我一定要在明天

translation.en: before the sun sets and he sees me...
translation.zh:
太阳下山以前嫁给法克大人
免得他看到我

translation.en: like this. [sobs]
translation.zh: 这个样子

translation.en: All right, all right. Calm down. Look, it's not that bad.
translation.zh: 好了 别激动 没这么糟糕

translation.en: You're not that ugly. Well, I ain't gonna lie. You are ugly.
translation.zh: 你也不是真的很丑 我不会说谎 你真的很丑

translation.en: But you only look like this at night. Shrek's ugly 24-7.
translation.zh:
可是你晚上才会这样
史瑞克可是天天都这样

translation.en: But, Donkey, I'm a princess,
translation.zh: 驴子 我是个公主

translation.en: and this is not how a princess is meant to look.
translation.zh: 一个公主怎么可以长成这个样子

translation.en: Princess, how 'bout if you don't marry Farquaad?
translation.zh: 公主 如果你不嫁给法克会怎么样？

translation.en: I have to.
translation.zh: 我非嫁不可

translation.en: Only my true love's kiss can break the spell.
translation.zh: 只有跟我的真爱接吻才能够解除咒语

translation.en: But, you know, um, you're kind of an ogre,
translation.zh: 可是你想想 你也算是一种怪物

translation.en: and Shrek-- well, you got a lot in common.
translation.zh: 可是你想想 你也算是一种怪物 而史瑞克某些方面跟你蛮像的

translation.en: Shrek?
translation.zh: 史瑞克？

translation.en: Princess, I-- Uh, how's it going, first of all?
translation.zh: 公主 我… 你还好吧？

translation.en: Good? Um, good for me too. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 很好 我也很好

translation.en: I saw this flower and thought of you because it's pretty and--
translation.zh:
我看到这些花然后想到你
因为花很漂亮而且…

translation.en: well, I don't really like it,
translation.zh: 我并不喜欢

translation.en: but I thought you might like it 'cause you're pretty.
translation.zh:
但是我想应该你会喜欢
因为你很漂亮

translation.en: But I like you anyway. I'd-- uh, uh--
translation.zh: 反正我很喜欢你 我…

translation.en: I'm in trouble. Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: 我真是语无伦次了 不管了 来吧

translation.en: [Fiona] I can't just marry whoever I want.
translation.zh: 不管了 来吧

translation.en: Take a good look at me, Donkey. I mean, really,
translation.zh: 看着我 驴子 我是说真的

translation.en: who could ever love a beast so hideous and ugly?
translation.zh: 谁会爱上一个可怕而丑陋的怪物？

translation.en: "Princess" and "ugly" don't go together.
translation.zh: 公主跟丑是不能扯在一起的

translation.en: -That's why I can't stay here with Shrek. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 所以我不能跟史瑞克在一起

translation.en: My only chance to live happily ever after is to marry my true love.
translation.zh:
我必须跟我的真爱结婚
这样我才能过幸福快乐的日子

translation.en: -[deep sigh] -Don't you see, Donkey?
translation.zh: 你还不懂吗 驴子？

translation.en: That's just how it has to be.
translation.zh: 我必须这么做

translation.en: It's the only way to break the spell.
translation.zh: 只有这样才能解除咒语

translation.en: -You at least gotta tell Shrek the truth. -No!
translation.zh:
至少你得跟史瑞克说出真相 不！你什么都不能说出去
这件事必须保密才行

translation.en: You can't breathe a word. No one must ever know.
translation.zh:
不！你什么都不能说出去
这件事必须保密才行

translation.en: What's the point of being able to talk if you gotta keep secrets?
translation.zh: 这有什么大不了 你非要保密吗？

translation.en: Promise you won't tell. Promise!
translation.zh:
-答应我你不会告诉他 答应我
-好的 我不会说的

translation.en: All right, all right. I won't tell him. But you should.
translation.zh:
-答应我你不会告诉他 答应我
-好的 我不会说的 可是你应该说
我都快去看心理医生了

translation.en: I just know before this is over, I'm gonna need a whole lot of serious therapy.
translation.zh:
可是你应该说
我都快去看心理医生了

translation.en: -Look at my eye twitchin'. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 我眼睛都斜视了

translation.en: [Fiona] I tell him, I tell him not.
translation.zh: 告诉他 不告诉他

translation.en: I tell him, I tell him not.
translation.zh: 告诉他 不告诉他

translation.en: I tell him.
translation.zh: 告诉他

translation.en: Shrek!
translation.zh: 史瑞克！

translation.en: Shrek, there's something I want--
translation.zh: 史瑞克！ 我有些事要…

translation.en: Shrek.
translation.zh: 史瑞克

translation.en: -Are you all right? -Perfect! Never been better.
translation.zh:
-你还好吧？
-好极了！好得不能再好了

translation.en: I-- I don't-- There's something I have to tell you.
translation.zh: 我… 我有些事要告诉你

translation.en: You don't have to tell me anything, Princess.
translation.zh: 你不必告诉我任何事情 公主

translation.en: -I heard enough last night. -You heard what I said?
translation.zh:
昨天晚上我已经听得够多了 -我说的话你都听到了？
-完全听到

translation.en: Every word.
translation.zh:
-我说的话你都听到了？
-完全听到

translation.en: -I thought you'd understand. -Oh, I understand.
translation.zh:
-我还以为你会了解
-我是很了解

translation.en: Like you said, "Who could love a hideous, ugly beast?"
translation.zh:
就像你说的 谁会爱一个
可怕又丑陋的怪物？

translation.en: But I thought that wouldn't matter to you. Yeah? Well, it does.
translation.zh:
-可是我以为你不会在意
-我很在意

translation.en: -Ah, right on time. -[horse whinnies]
translation.zh: 来得刚刚好

translation.en: Princess, I've brought you a little something.
translation.zh: 公主 我有个小东西要送给你

translation.en: [yawns] What'd I miss? What'd I miss?
translation.zh: 我错过什么好戏没有？

translation.en: [muffled] Who said that? Couldn't have been a donkey.
translation.zh: 谁跟谁在说话？驴子可不会说话

translation.en: Princess Fiona.
translation.zh: 菲欧娜公主 你好

translation.en: As promised. Now hand it over.
translation.zh: 依照我们的约定 我把她交给你了

translation.en: Very well, ogre. The deed to your swamp, cleared out, as agreed.
translation.zh: 非常好 怪物 沼泽是你的了 把闲杂人等都赶走

translation.en: Take it and go before I change my mind.
translation.zh: 趁我还没改变主意 带着协议书滚吧

translation.en: [Farquaad] Forgive me, Princess, for startling you,
translation.zh: 请原谅我 公主 让你受惊了

translation.en: but you startled me,
translation.zh: 可是 是你先吓到我的

translation.en: for I have never seen such a radiant beauty before.
translation.zh:
因为我从来没看过
像这你这么美丽的女孩子

translation.en: I am Lord Farquaad.
translation.zh: 我是法克大人

translation.en: Lord Farquaad? Oh, no, no.
translation.zh: 你就是法克？ 不对

translation.en: [snaps fingers] Forgive me, my lord, for I was just saying...
translation.zh:
请原谅我大人
能不能让我做个简短的…

translation.en: a short... farewell.
translation.zh:
请原谅我大人
能不能让我做个简短的… 告别

translation.en: Ah, that is so sweet. You don't have to waste good manners on the ogre.
translation.zh: 真是太可爱了 你实在不必浪费精神在这个怪物身上

translation.en: [chuckles] It's not like it has feelings.
translation.zh: 怪物都是没情感的

translation.en: No, you're right. It doesn't.
translation.zh: 对 你说得没错 它是没有

translation.en: Princess Fiona, beautiful, fair, flawless Fiona.
translation.zh:
菲欧娜公主
美丽、美妙、美好的菲欧娜

translation.en: -I ask your hand in marriage. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 我现在要请求你嫁给我

translation.en: Will you be the perfect bride for the perfect groom?
translation.zh: 你愿不愿意当完美新郎的完美新娘？

translation.en: Lord Farquaad, I accept. Nothing would make--
translation.zh:
法克大人 我愿意 -没有人…
-太完美了

translation.en: Excellent! I'll start the plans, for tomorrow we wed!
translation.zh:
-没有人…
-太完美了 我马上筹备婚礼！
明天一早我们就结婚

translation.en: No! I mean, uh,
translation.zh: 不 我是说…

translation.en: why wait?
translation.zh: 何必等呢？

translation.en: Let's get married today before the sun sets.
translation.zh: 我们今天就结婚吧 在日落之前

translation.en: Oh, anxious, are we? You're right.
